name: Jumpscare to Live
description:
In Jumpscare to Live, you'll play the role of a ghost who is trying to protect their living roommate from a person outside the house. Unfortunately, Roommate doesn't realize what danger lurks at his window, and thinks you're just tormenting him. Maybe he'll get the picture if you keep knocking things over? If it means keeping your poor, oblivious friend safe from harm, then it's worth trying! 

Demo Features

  • The first stage of gameplay, complete with cut scenes and tutorial
  • A delightful and scary narrative
  • Sudden jumpscares can be disabled in the game's options.
  • Original music by Greisinger
